name: Lost In C#
description:
A game made for the global game jam 2020 by Jan Lygnos (@likeaguest) and Thalia Darkow. All art assets, sounds, music and code were created by us.

Everybody loves games. This game is about a story of a bunch of seamen. Support the crew of pirates... eh, honorable sailors in their adventures! Can they endure all the mischief on sea? ...or is the sea the least problem?
